name: Statistics
description: As part of this data store, metrics related to Hits (Edge/Midgress/Origin), Volume (Edge/Midgress/Origin), Offload and Edge Responses are available by Time and CP Code dimensions. Data is available at a minimum granularity of 5 minutes.

dimensions.name: Time
dimensions.description: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. Akamai automatically sets this dimension.
dimensions.helpText: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. Akamai automatically sets this dimension.

dimensions.name: CPCode
dimensions.description: Content Provider Code (CPCode) is an identifier assigned to a contract and used for reporting, billing and monitoring traffic served.
dimensions.helpText: Content Provider Code (CPCode) is an identifier assigned to a contract and used for reporting, billing and monitoring traffic served.

metrics.name: Edge + Midgress
metrics.description: Sum of Edge And Midgress Volume
metrics.helpText: Sum of Edge And Midgress Volume

metrics.name: Peer Volume
metrics.description: peer_bytes

metrics.name: Edge Hits
metrics.description: All hits to the edge servers from the end users.
metrics.helpText: All hits to the edge servers from the end users.

metrics.name: Edge Object Volume
metrics.description: Size of the actual content (Object body) transferred to the client.
metrics.helpText: Size of the actual content (Object body) transferred to the client.

metrics.name: Edge Overhead Volume
metrics.description: Total number of protocol component bytes that include request bytes, TCP/IP overhead bytes, Ethernet bytes and UDP/IP overhead bytes served from the edge server to the end user
metrics.helpText: Total number of protocol component bytes that include request bytes, TCP/IP overhead bytes, Ethernet bytes and UDP/IP overhead bytes served from the edge server to the end user

metrics.name: Edge Cached Volume
metrics.description: Total bytes delivered from edge servers in which content wasn't served from the parent edge server or an origin server.
metrics.helpText: Total bytes delivered from edge servers in which content wasn't served from the parent edge server or an origin server.

metrics.name: Edge Secure Volume
metrics.description: Total bytes delivered from the Edge serves over HTTPS transfer.

metrics.name: Midgress Hits
metrics.description: Midgress traffic includes hits from edge servers to other edge servers.
metrics.helpText: Midgress traffic includes hits from edge servers to other edge servers.

metrics.name: Midgress Object Volume
metrics.description: Total object bytes transferred from one edge server to another edge server.
metrics.helpText: Total object bytes transferred from one edge server to another edge server.

metrics.name: Midgress Overhead Volume
metrics.description: Total number of protocol component bytes that include Request bytes, TCP/IP overhead bytes, Ethernet bytes and UDP/IP overhead bytes served from the one edge server to another edge server.
metrics.helpText: Total number of protocol component bytes that include Request bytes, TCP/IP overhead bytes, Ethernet bytes and UDP/IP overhead bytes served from the one edge server to another edge server.

metrics.name: Origin Hits
metrics.description: All hits on the origin servers from edge servers.
metrics.helpText: All hits on the origin servers from edge servers.

metrics.name: Origin Object Volume
metrics.description: Total object bytes transferred from the customer origin server to the edge servers.
metrics.helpText: Total object bytes transferred from the customer origin server to the edge servers.

metrics.name: Origin Overhead Volume
metrics.description: Total number of protocol component bytes that include request bytes, TCP/IP overhead bytes, Ethernet bytes and UDP/IP overhead bytes served from the origin server to the edge server.
metrics.helpText: Total number of protocol component bytes that include request bytes, TCP/IP overhead bytes, Ethernet bytes and UDP/IP overhead bytes served from the origin server to the edge server.

metrics.name: Download Completed
metrics.description: Number of downloads successfully served. The entire download was served (HTTP status 200) or the byte range contained the last byte of the download (HTTP status 206).
metrics.helpText: Number of downloads successfully served. The entire download was served (HTTP status 200) or the byte range contained the last byte of the download (HTTP status 206).

metrics.name: 0XX Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response codes- 0xx (Client Abort)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response codes- 0xx (Client Abort)

metrics.name: 200 Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response code - 200 (Successful)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response code - 200 (Successful)

metrics.name: 206 Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response code - 206 (Partial Content)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response code - 206 (Partial Content)

metrics.name: 2XX Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response codes - 200 to 299 (Successful)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response codes - 200 to 299 (Successful)

metrics.name: 302 Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response code - 302 (Redirection Status Code - Found)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response code - 302 (Redirection Status Code - Found)

metrics.name: 304 Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response codes - 304 (Redirection Status Code - Not Modified)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response codes - 304 (Redirection Status Code - Not Modified)

metrics.name: 3XX Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response codes - 300 to 399 (Redirection)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response codes - 300 to 399 (Redirection)

metrics.name: 404 Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned the response code - 404 (File not Found)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned the response code - 404 (File not Found)

metrics.name: 415 Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response code - 415 (Unsupported Media Type)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response code - 415 (Unsupported Media Type)

metrics.name: 403 Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response code - 403 (Forbidden)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response code - 403 (Forbidden)

metrics.name: 4XX Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response codes - 400 to 499 (Client Error)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response codes - 400 to 499 (Client Error)

metrics.name: 5XX Edge Hits
metrics.description: Number of hits that returned response codes - 500 to 599 (Server Error)
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that returned response codes - 500 to 599 (Server Error)

metrics.name: Other Hits
metrics.description: When a response code doesn't fall within the codes 2xx to 5xx, it's considered an "Other" hit.
metrics.helpText: When a response code doesn't fall within the codes 2xx to 5xx, it's considered an "Other" hit.

metrics.name: 404 Object Volume
metrics.description: Size of the content (Object body) transferred to the client in case of 404 responses.
metrics.helpText: Size of the content (Object body) transferred to the client in case of 404 responses.

metrics.name: 404 Overhead Volume
metrics.description: err_404_overbytes

metrics.name: NetStorage Hits
metrics.description: All hits from the edge servers to the NetStorage domain.
metrics.helpText: All hits from the edge servers to the NetStorage domain.

metrics.name: NetStorage Volume
metrics.description: The total bytes transferred from the NetStorage domain to the edge servers.
metrics.helpText: The total bytes transferred from the NetStorage domain to the edge servers.

metrics.name: Download Starts
metrics.description: Number of times the download was successfully initiated during a specific time interval.
metrics.helpText: Number of times the download was successfully initiated during a specific time interval.

metrics.name: Origin Volume
metrics.description: Total number of megabytes transferred from the origin to the edge server, including overhead bytes.
metrics.helpText: Total number of megabytes transferred from the origin to the edge server, including overhead bytes.

metrics.name: Ingress Hits
metrics.description: All the hits from the edge server to origin, this includes customer origin and NetStorage.
metrics.helpText: All the hits from the edge server to origin, this includes customer origin and NetStorage.

metrics.name: Ingress Volume
metrics.description: Total number of megabytes, including overhead bytes, transferred from the origin to the edge server. This includes NetStorage and customer origin.
metrics.helpText: Total number of megabytes, including overhead bytes, transferred from the origin to the edge server. This includes NetStorage and customer origin.

metrics.name: Offload (Hits)
metrics.description: Percentage of hits from the edge servers as compared to the hits from the origin server, including NetStorage and customer origin. (Edge Hits - Ingress Hits) / Edge Hits * 100
metrics.helpText: Percentage of hits from the edge servers as compared to the hits from the origin server, including NetStorage and customer origin. (Edge Hits - Ingress Hits) / Edge Hits * 100

metrics.name: Offload (Volume)
metrics.description:
Percentage of bytes delivered from the Edge Servers as compared to the bytes delivered from origin server, including NetStorage and customer origin.
This metric displays accurate values only for CP Codes that use Adaptive Media Delivery configuration. The metric displays incorrect values for CP Codes that use 'Media Services Live' or 'Media Services On Demand'.
metrics.helpText:
Percentage of bytes delivered from the Edge Servers as compared to the bytes delivered from origin server, including NetStorage and customer origin.
This metric displays accurate values only for CP Codes that use Adaptive Media Delivery configuration. The metric displays incorrect values for CP Codes that use 'Media Services Live' or 'Media Services On Demand'.

metrics.name: Prefetch Midgress Count
metrics.description: Total number of hits from an Edge Server to a parent edge server (not origin) to prefetch content.
metrics.helpText: Total number of hits from an Edge Server to a parent edge server (not origin) to prefetch content.

metrics.name: Prefetch Midgress Volume
metrics.description: Total Bytes transferred from Parent server to an edge server when content is prefetched.
metrics.helpText: Total Bytes transferred from Parent server to an edge server when content is prefetched.

metrics.name: Ingress Bandwidth
metrics.description: Ingress Bandwidth
metrics.helpText: Ingress Bandwidth

metrics.name: Midgress Bandwidth
metrics.description: Midgress Bandwidth
metrics.helpText: Midgress Bandwidth

metrics.name: Edge Hits/sec
metrics.description: Edge Hits/sec
metrics.helpText: Edge Hits/sec

metrics.name: Midgress Hits/sec
metrics.description: Midgress Hits/sec
metrics.helpText: Midgress Hits/sec

metrics.name: Ingress Hits/sec
metrics.description: Ingress Hits/sec
metrics.helpText: Ingress Hits/sec

metrics.name: Edge Error Rate
metrics.description: Edge Error Rate
metrics.helpText: Edge Error Rate

metrics.name: Edge Bandwidth
metrics.description: Edge Bandwidth
metrics.helpText: Edge Bandwidth

metrics.name: Edge Errors
metrics.description: Number of hits that resulted in error responses for your objects. It's the sum of all 4xx and 5xx hits.
metrics.helpText: Number of hits that resulted in error responses for your objects. It's the sum of all 4xx and 5xx hits.

metrics.name: Edge Throughput
metrics.description: Rate of successful delivery of media from the edge server. It's calculated as the total bytes delivered divided by the total time taken by ghost to serve the request.
metrics.helpText: Rate of successful delivery of media from the edge server. It's calculated as the total bytes delivered divided by the total time taken by ghost to serve the request.

metrics.name: Edge Volume
metrics.description: Total number of megabytes transferred between the Edge to the end user, including overhead bytes.
metrics.helpText: Total number of megabytes transferred between the Edge to the end user, including overhead bytes.

metrics.name: Download Requests
metrics.description: Number of download requests received from end user, during a specific time interval.
metrics.helpText: Number of download requests received from end user, during a specific time interval.

metrics.name: Midgress Volume
metrics.description: midgress_bytes

metrics.name: Avg Download Time
metrics.description: download time for OCP
